repeated_behaviors.description: The subject repeatedly scratches their head with their right hand for approximately 5 seconds.
The subject begins tapping their right foot rapidly on the floor. This behavior continues intermittently for the next minute.
The subject abruptly stops speaking and begins looking around the room in a seemingly anxious manner. This lasts for about 10 seconds before they resume speaking.

abnormal_behaviors.description: The subject appears to be talking to themself in hushed tones. It is unclear what they are saying, but the behavior seems unusual in the context of the video.
The subject bursts into laughter at a seemingly inappropriate moment. There is no apparent trigger for this laughter.
